text: ryy muoy puokke niyeay tha ke( mou ham meat) ban bradit vea laeng? phtoytowvinh vea kuchea karpit mk pi mcheasa robsa anak daembi aoy anak dasatuen promean champoh krom muoy del kmean anak dasatuen promean namuoy pimoun anak mokadl puokke laey . sangkhumtha puokke nung ttuol ban kar changaoulobangheanh
